price: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang menukar iman dengan kekafiran, sekali-kali mereka tidak dapat memberi mudarat kepada Allah sedikit pun; dan bagi mereka azab yang pedih.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ish'tarawū al-kuf'ra bil-īmāni lan yaḍurrū al-laha shayan walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
